title: Boral tur chhandam ru chaute enkawl ru
lyrics:
Boral tur chhandam r'u, chaute enkawl r'u,
Sual thlan atangin hnuk chhuak vek ula;
Mi sualte tah chhan r'u, tlute kaitho r'u,
Chhandamtu, Mi lian chanchin hrialh ula.

Boral tur chhandam r'u,
Chaute enkawl r'u;
Isua zahngai thei chuan,
A chhandam ang.

Amah hmusittute, anin a nghak e,
A fa sim lawm turin a ngahk reng ang;
Thahnemin fuih rawh u, nunnemin thlem r'u,
Annin an awih chuan a ngaidam duh ang.

Thlemt'n mi rilrua thu tha a rawt a,
Hmangaihnaa chawmin a tha thei ang;
Zaidamin hrilh ila, ngilneiin hruai la,
Hmana a that angin a tha leh ang.

Boral tur chhandam nan tih tur I nei e,
Thawk thei turin Lalpan a pui ang che;
Zaidamin thlem chhuak la, kawng zimah hruai la,
Chhandamtu a tih, vakvaite hrilh la.
